pages.text: It seems I might get three different forms of amethyst when breaking a crystal inside a geode. The first is a small pile of shimmering dust, worth a small amount of _media.
The second is a shard of amethyst, of the type I might be used to. This has about as much _media inside as five $(item)Amethyst Dust/$s.
Finally, a large crystal crackling with energy. This has about as much _media inside as ten $(item)Amethyst Dust/$s (and therefore two $(item)Amethyst Shard/$s).
